human_safety.definition: Impact on human lives if the company stops operating for 1 month

num_customers_in_critical_services.definition: Number of customers relying on essential services provided by the company

healthcare_clients_affected.definition: Number of hospitals or clinics served by the company

essential_services_continuity.definition: Impact on continuity of services critical for society

num_key_clients.definition: Number of major clients relying on the company's essential services

critical_service_hours_per_month.definition: Hours of essential service delivered per month

number_of_facilities_providing_critical_.definition: Number of facilities delivering essential services

social_stability.definition: Potential disruption to societal systems and communities

num_downstream_business_clients.definition: Number of B2B clients dependent on the company

num_communities_served.definition: Number of communities or regions impacted by the company's operations

regulatory_sectoral_importance.definition: Importance of the company in regulated or critical sectors

regulated_sector_flag.definition: Whether the company operates in a regulated or critical sector

number_of_mandatory_compliances.definition: Number of licenses, certifications, or regulatory obligations maintained
